subject: Golf
Writing and Writers
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Ten years after Herbert Warren Wind’s death, few can identify him as the man who introduced “Amen Corner” to golf lexicon. Ben Crenshaw, though, playing in his final Masters, remembers Wind well.
snippet: Ten years after Herbert Warren Wind’s death, few can identify him as the man who introduced “Amen Corner” to golf lexicon. Ben Crenshaw, though, playing in his final Masters, remembers Wind well.
